feed.title: Category: Super Starforce | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Super Starforce (NES, 1986)
entry.content: This sounded like a really cool game: a combination of a shooter and an adventure game where you travel through connected stages, etc. Unfortunately, I found it impossible to understand what I was supposed to do. I intend to give it another chance, maybe after reading a manual, but I couldn't cope with it when I tried it the first time.
